name: Aloo (Potatoes)
description: Yeh desi aloo hai – seedhe kisaan ke khet se! Har dish mein kam aate hain, chahe wo bhaji ho ya paratha. Bohot hi soft aur tasty.

name: Chawal (Rice)
description: Premium quality chawal, soft aur fluffy banta hai jab bhi pakao. Biryani aur plain chawal dono mein best taste aata hai.

name: Tamatar (Tomatoes)
description: Lal-lal, juicy tamatar jo har sabzi ko banaye lajawab. Ye fresh aur pesticide-free hai. Chutney ke liye bhi best!

name: Pyaz (Onions)
description: Tear-free aur taste-full pyaz. Har kitchen ka must-have. Raita, bhaji, fry ya curry – sab mein use hota hai.

name: Gehu (Wheat)
description: High-fiber gehu jo roti ko banata hai soft aur healthy. Chakki peesaane ke liye perfect choice hai.

name: Gajar (Carrots)
description: Lal rang ki crisp gajar, jisme hai health ka full dose. Halwa ho ya salad – sab ke liye perfect.

name: Phool Gobhi (Cauliflower)
description: Moti aur tight gobhi jo sabzi mein nahi girti. Paneer gobhi ho ya masala gobhi – sab mein taste top-notch.

name: Matar (Green Peas)
description: Sweet aur juicy matar, bina kisi chemical ke. Matar paneer ya fried rice mein badiya jaata hai.

name: Patta Gobhi (Cabbage)
description: Green aur healthy cabbage jo stir-fry aur salad dono ke liye best hai. Bohot crisp aur fresh.

name: Palak (Spinach)
description: Green leafy palak jo iron se bhara hai. Palak paneer, soup ya paratha ke liye perfect.
